title: Crumbling Wor(l)d _ SCP-5404 Art
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:penumbra-bhl]]

[[size larger]]**SCP-5404** [[/size]] 


[[collapsible show="Are you sure you want to say that "letter-cluster"?" hide="boom-boom"]]

[[image 5404.PNG]]
[[/collapsible]]
    
[[collapsible show="Look into the telescope?" hide="You see something on the shining Moon."]]
> Since I first read SCP-5404, this image got stuck in my mind. It is a "seemingly funny" article, but behind that lies a world crumbling down, controls snatched out of the Foundation's hand, and everything seems to be spiraling out of control. After many thoughts, I'm happy that I can pull this out and make the vision in my mind come true.
>  
> [*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/art:a-shining-moon-s-observatory Enter the Observatory?]
[[/collapsible]]
     
[[collapsible show="Find the source of the Celestial Object?" hide="SCP-5404"]]
[[[*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-5404]]]

[[/collapsible]]
